name: Rancher Style Baked Beans & Eggs

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning or Pulled Pork Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, whisk together seasoning, water, tomatoes, molasses, and vinegar.
Drain and rinse beans; combine with sauce. Cover; microwave on high until warmed through, 10 min.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large fry pan over medium-high heat. Thinly slice bell pepper and cook until softened, about 3–5 min.
Once beans are cooked, add half (about 4 cups) to the pan and stir. Reserve remainder for future use.
Make four wells in the beans and break an egg into  each one.
Cover pan with a lid and cook until egg whites are set, about 2–3 min.
Remove from heat and add spinach; cover until spinach is slightly wilted, about 30 sec. Serve with additional toppings, if desired.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kind—free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Pulled Pork Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: This seasoning is a shortcut to the south when you’re in the mood for some BBQ! Grab a slow cooker and let the pork slowly infuse with notes of deep, sweet ‘n tangy barbecue and a hint of smokiness. So good!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
